games.name: DECODE
games.description: Robots earned points by scoring artifacts in their goal, decoding a randomized match Motif displayed on the obelisk to build matching patterns on their ramp.

games.name: INTO THE DEEP
games.description: Robots scored samples into baskets, converted them into specimens to place in chambers, and climbed a submersible bar in the endgame.

games.name: CENTERSTAGE
games.description: Robots placed pixels on a backdrop, navigated over trusses, and hung from a rigging bar in the endgame.

games.name: POWERPLAY
games.description: Robots placed cones on various height junctions to create connected circuits across the field.

games.name: Freight Frenzy
games.description: Robots moved freight (balls/cubes) onto alliance hubs, balanced the hub, spun a duck carousel, and parked in specific zones.

games.name: Ultimate Goal
games.description: Robots shot rings into low, mid, and high goals, knocked down “power shot” targets, and delivered wobble goals to target zones.
